programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Mia's Prince
programme.desc: Romance novel enthusiast Mia meets Beau, a philanthropist, who is the spitting image of her favorite book hero. As they consider exploring a new romance, Beau's mother has other ideas.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Round and Round
programme.desc: Rachel's stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents' Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the nice boy grandma's trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: Christmas party planners Ella and her sister Marianne clash with client Edward, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Mia's Prince
programme.desc: Romance novel enthusiast Mia meets Beau, a philanthropist, who is the spitting image of her favorite book hero. As they consider exploring a new romance, Beau's mother has other ideas.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: Ted and Marcus are celebrating their engagement with Ted's family this Christmas; Ted isn't out to Grandma Lin, which leads to a misunderstanding that Marcus is engaged to Ted's sister, Ella.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: Lucy and her sister Sylvie have been at odds since their Mom's sudden passing when they were kids; now, as adults, Sylvie's home for Hanukkah and wants to spice things up.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche robs the cradle to convince Jason, her new lover, how young she is.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A suspicious Rose asks neighbor Barbara Weston, to investigate her new boyfriend, at the same time that MIles returns to her life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Long ago antics by Sophia come to light when Dorothy's high-school prom date appears.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche robs the cradle to convince Jason, her new lover, how young she is.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A suspicious Rose asks neighbor Barbara Weston, to investigate her new boyfriend, at the same time that MIles returns to her life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Long ago antics by Sophia come to light when Dorothy's high-school prom date appears.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles discover their father is dating two women simultaneously.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier hunts for a schoolmate who was expelled for the Crane boys' prank.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After a near-death experience, Reba decides to put her personal matters in order and write a will; Reba discovers that Cheyenne and Van have asked Brock and Barbra Jean to be Elizabeth's guardian if something should happen to them.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock and Barbra Jean tell Reba they are buying a nearby house; troubled Reba tries to come up with the cash she needs to send Kyra to England and Cheyenne to summer school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra contemplates moving in with Brock and Barbra Jean; Cheyenne and Van make plans to use Kyra's room as a nursery.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba feels closer than ever to Kyra since she moved in with Brock and Barbra Jean, especially because Kyra is driving them crazy.

programme.title: Christmas CEO
programme.desc: The CEO of a small toy company gets a once-in-a-lifetime offer to merge with a much bigger company -- but needs her estranged ex-business partner's signature to seal the deal.

programme.title: My Southern Family Christmas
programme.desc: Under the guise of a journalist, Campbell has a chance to get to know her biological father for the first time -- without him ever knowing who she really is.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: Lauren leaves everything behind in Boston to embark on a new chapter in her life and career. On an unforeseen detour to the town of Grandon Falls, she discovers love and family, helping her to embrace the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: The Hallmark Christmas cruise approaches The Bahamas, where challenges, surprises, and life changing moments await the passengers.
